active_skill.name: Straight in the Heart
active_skill.description:
Throws a dart at the target, dealing Physical DMG.

DMG Multiplier: 608%

Daze Multiplier: 355%

Cooldown 16s

additional_ability.name: Crossfire Missiles
additional_ability.description: When there is at least 1 Pierce-type character in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack DMG increases by 60%.

chain_attack.name: Dart of Desperation
chain_attack.description:
Launches itself with a slingshot, flying towards the target and performing consecutive slashes, dealing massive Physical DMG.

DMG Multiplier: 1662%

Daze Multiplier: 237%
